hero.title: Modern conversions for apartments and houses
hero.subtitle: Siska Construction delivers thoughtful reconstructions that balance refined aesthetics with resilient detail, managing every phase from concept to final styling.

team.title: Precision led by Robert Siska
team.subtitle: With over 30 years of experience and a strong background in business and management, Robert and his team take pride in delivering complete customer satisfaction on every project, big or small.
team.description: We partner with verified suppliers and craftsmen to orchestrate renovations that feel effortless for the client. Weekly reporting, transparent costing and on-site supervision ensure every detail lands exactly as planned.
highlights: End-to-end project management with curated suppliers
Certified craftsmen and bespoke joinery workshop
Transparent budgeting with weekly progress reviews

contact.title: Ready to start your renovation?
contact.subtitle: Call or email Robert Siska to arrange a consultation, site visit or budgeting workshop.
